content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, and electrical_id updated to 21956.
- ElectricityGroup (id = 21956) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points [(-10.5, 16.0), (-10.5, 21.0)].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning [out of fuel], updated to use fluid_system 101139 with connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)] and steam output point (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING with fluid_systems [101139].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 101139, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 101138, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 101151, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 101150, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 101146, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 101155, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 101154, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 101157, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 101158, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 101159, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Repeated Connection Failures and Fluid System Mismatches:
  • Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [100475, 100559, 100641, 100725, 100807, 100891, 100973, 101057] returned no candidates near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify current fluid_system identifiers from the final pipeline configuration to ensure up-to-date references.
- Inadequate Candidate Selection Within Fixed Search Parameters:
  • Searches conducted near Position(-5.5, 19.5) with a fixed search radius of 15 failed to locate any candidate pipe groups.
  • Tip: Adjust the search radius and positional constraints based on current map data for improved candidate selection.
- Synchronization Between Connection Logic and Pipeline Configuration:
  • Discrepancies observed between attempted fluid_system identifiers and those present in the final entities (e.g., attempted identifiers versus final fluid_system 101139).
  • Tip: Ensure that connection procedures remain synchronized with real-time pipeline configurations to avoid mismatches.
